title: Hour 1: Will Levis joins the show!
description:
Harry Douglas, Chris Canty and Damien Woody all join the show to discuss the Cardinals removing the "independent study" clause from his contract. Plus the crew debates when Lamar Jackson should get his deal done, and if you'd rather have D.K Metcalf or Deebo Samuel. Plus Kentucky QB Will Levis joins the show to discuss the upcoming season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
